RESOURCE.NAME: Schema Enforcer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Produces an annotation set whose content is restricted by the specified set of schemas

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation set used as input to this PR

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation set used to store output from this PR

PARAMETER.NAME: useDefaults
PARAMETER.COMMENT: should we use the default value to add missing required features

PARAMETER.NAME: schemas
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the list of schemas that define the annotations to move from the input to the output annotation set

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
